pr_title: Add speed step dropdown to throttles

timeline.bodyText: Please change references to peopleKey or peopleName to description, since that is a common term for this kind of key elsewhere in our code.
timeline.author: rhwood

replies.bodyText:
@trainman419
The code still has peopleKey instead of description. Please change this.
replies.author: danielb987

timeline.message: Switch throttle to speed step dropdown
Switch throttle to speed step dropdown
